stages.title: Night train from Toulouse
stages.description: My journey starts in Toulouse tonight. Tomorrow I will be joining Franco in Paris.

stages.title: Plonistas in Paris
stages.description: In this new episode of Emily in Paris, we discovered that Emily is actually a

stages.title: Visiting Hamburg
stages.description: Spending the day visiting this pleasant city before taking the night train to Stockholm tonight.

stages.title: Stockholm
stages.description: And we made it to Stockholm!

stages.title: Turku
stages.description: After a night cruise, we have a last train to Jyv채skyl채.

stages.title: On the way back, short stop in Tampere
stages.description: This train happened to be full of plonistas!

stages.title: Back in Hamburg
stages.description: Spending the night here, and tomorrow, that will be the final travel day, with 3 trains in series!

stages.title: Karlsruhe
stages.description:
That was the only fragile connection I had in the full trip: 20 minutes only.
I knew that was risky, but I got lucky: despite a delay that was going up and down between Hamburg and Karlsruhe, I got it just in time!!
Thank you Deutsche Bahn, you did not let me down the day of my birthday :)

stages.title: Paris
stages.description: The usual game in Paris: going from one station to another.

stages.title: Bordeaux
stages.description: That's the city I was born, exactly 51 years ago on this very day!!! Happy birthday me!
